item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 24, 2024 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Wall-mounted diffusion mirror that turns reflections into paintings (112 points | 31 comments)
2. Everything I built with Claude Artifacts this week (354 points | 265 comments)
3. After 16 years of development, Postbox Inc. is winding down its operations (24 points | 7 comments)
4. Playstation Vita Architecture (Part 1) (141 points | 50 comments)
5. Ask HN: Is It Wrong to Use My Personal Laptop for Work? (17 points | 39 comments)
6. NetGuard – rootless Android outbound per-app OSS firewall, like LittleSnitch (10 points | 2 comments)
7. What happens when you make a move in lichess.org? (195 points | 94 comments)
8. Show HN: Open-source low-code email editor (77 points | 15 comments)
9. It has been [33] days since the last Hubris kernel bug (34 points | 5 comments)
10. Probably pay attention to tokenizers (186 points | 57 comments)
11. A DSL for peephole transformation rules of integer operations in the PyPy JIT (83 points | 6 comments)
12. My NumPy year: Creating a DType for the next generation of scientific computing (31 points | 2 comments)
13. Async Rust in Three Parts (91 points | 22 comments)
14. Irreproducible Results (14 points | 10 comments)
15. Launch HN: GPT Driver (YC S21) – End-to-end app testing in natural language (91 points | 71 comments)
16. Parks on the Air (80 points | 36 comments)
17. Taming the buck with a Type III compensator (30 points | 5 comments)
18. Show HN: I built a task manager that separates "do" and "due" dates (107 points | 49 comments)
19. Reinforcement Learning: An Introduction (2018) (57 points | 13 comments)
20. Bulk optimization of queries in Postgres (51 points | 3 comments)
21. The Tragedy of Google Books (2017) (388 points | 158 comments)
22. Seeing faces in things: A model and dataset for pareidolia (39 points | 7 comments)
23. Goldman and Apple 'illegally sidestepped' obligations to credit-card customers (233 points | 124 comments)
24. Fearless SSH: Short-lived certificates bring Zero Trust to infrastructure (69 points | 56 comments)
25. DawVert – a DAW project file converter (42 points | 15 comments)
26. The Incredible Machine (1968) [video] (68 points | 34 comments)
27. Ground beef stimulates more protein synthesis than soy based meat (9 points | 3 comments)
28. Show HN: Agent.exe, a cross-platform app to let 3.5 Sonnet control your machine (329 points | 187 comments)
29. The global surveillance free-for-all in mobile ad data (220 points | 109 comments)
30. BazelCon 2024 Recap (44 points | 21 comments)
